name: High-Value Early-Access Window
description: Deal-hungry shoppers are moving earlier in the season, creating a premium early-access window for collaborations. Early, invitation-only collabs capture higher buyer-intent without triggering broad price expectations.
operator_move: Run a 2-week early-access collab owned by Brand + Retail Ops + Partnerships in the 6-week window, targeting early_window_share 20-30% (owner: Brand + Retail Ops + Partnerships; window: 6-week; KPI: early_window_share 20-30%).
operator_scan: Test early-access collab conversion and share of early buyers.
spine_hook: Early, invitation-only collabs win intent without sitewide price resets

name: Price-Curve Optimization Changes Discount Math
description: Optimizing volume price curves shifts where incremental revenue comes from and changes break-even for promotions. Using curated price curves for collab SKUs preserves margin while growing units at targeted elasticities.
operator_move: Execute a volume price-curve test owned by Pricing + Finance in the 6-week window, measuring promo ROI and margin elasticity to redefine promo depth (owner: Pricing + Finance; window: 6-week; KPI: promo ROI and margin elasticity).
operator_scan: Compare promo ROI across depth tiers for collab SKUs.
spine_hook: Price curves redefine how deep a discount must be to hit volume targets

name: Experience-Tied Offers Beat Blanket Percent-Offs
description: Time-limited, experience-linked incentives (event access, exclusive bundles) drive revenue without normalizing deep sitewide discounts. These offers reduce CPA per event and preserve full-price behavior outside the event.
operator_move: Replace one planned blanket sitewide promotion with an experience-tied offer in one market, owned by Promotions + Store Ops, window now to 6-week, targeting event_cpa <=0.8x baseline (owner: Promotions + Store Ops; window: now->6-week; KPI: event_cpa <=0.8x).
operator_scan: Measure event CPA and full-price carryover after experience offers.
spine_hook: Experience incentives reduce CPA and protect full-price sales

name: Store-as-Studio Concentrates Foot Traffic and Measurable Redeems
description: Converting flagship space into short-run brand studios raises foot traffic per event and yields higher on-site activation rates than blanket promotions. Measured QR redemptions and event CPA provide clean attribution for collab investments.
operator_move: Run four store-as-studio collab events in two flagship stores, owned by Store Experience + Brand Partnerships, window quarter, aiming for foot_traffic_uplift >=25% and qr_redemption >=5% of footfall (owner: Store Experience + Brand Partnerships; window: quarter; KPI: foot_traffic_uplift >=25%, qr_redemption >=5%).
operator_scan: Track foot traffic uplift and QR redemption rate per event.
spine_hook: Short-run brand studios concentrate high-value footfall and measurable redeems

name: Bundled and Tiered Offers Shift Buyer Activity Share
description: Bundling and tiered discounts change purchase composition more efficiently than flat percent-offs, increasing buyer share for target cohorts. When aligned with collab inventory, bundles drive higher per-transaction revenue and targeted activity share gains.
operator_move: Test a bundled tiered offer owned by Merch + Pricing for collab SKUs in a 6-week test, measuring buyer_activity_share movement from 12-15% toward 20-30% (owner: Merch + Pricing; window: 6-week; KPI: buyer_activity_share 20-30%).
operator_scan: Compare buyer activity share across bundled vs flat offers.
spine_hook: Bundles shift buyer composition and lift targeted activity share

name: Daily Dashboard: Buyer Activity vs Promo Intensity
description: Real-time pairing of buyer activity share and promo intensity is the operational control to stop runaway blanket discounts. A daily dashboard letting teams throttle promo intensity against event CPA prevents margin erosion during high-traffic windows.
operator_move: Stand up a daily dashboard owned by Analytics + Partnerships now, tracking buyer_activity_share vs promo_intensity and holding event_cpa <=0.8x baseline (owner: Analytics + Partnerships; window: now; KPI: event_cpa <=0.8x, weekly buyer_activity_share).
operator_scan: Plot buyer activity share against promo intensity day-over-day.
spine_hook: Daily buyer-activity vs promo-intensity dashboard prevents discount creep
